law.catch_line: Department of Housing, Buildings and Construction created -- Organization.
law.text: The Department of Housing, Buildings and Construction (hereinafter referred to as the department of housing) is hereby created within the Public Protection Cabinet. The department shall be headed by a commissioner appointed by the Governor in accordance with KRS 12.040, and who shall report to the secretary of the Public Protection Cabinet. The office of the commissioner shall also include a deputy commissioner and an executive assistant to the commissioner, who shall be the policy making assistants to the commissioner and shall be appointed pursuant to KRS 12.050. The department shall consist of the Division of Fire Prevention, the Division of Building Codes Enforcement, the Division of Plumbing, the Electrical Division, and the Division of Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC).
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 390, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 70, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 126, effective June 17, 1978.
